title: Ford Bed Plans
description: High-precision bed plans for Ford trucks.

products.title: 1999-2025 Ford F-250/F-350 Utility Bed W/ Deck-Side Boxes
description: Utility bed w/ deck-side boxes designed to fit on 1999-2025 Ford F-250/F-350 SRW short-bed trucks with 38" wide frames. Built with a 3" X 4.1# U-Channel frame, 3" X 1 1/2" 11 gauge rectangular tubing sub-frame, 16 gauge plate boxes & fenders, and 10 gauge plate deck & tail. Overall dimensions: 88" long X 80" wide.

Purchase includes: 45 page .pdf layout detailing all components & assemblies, a copy of the bill of materials, the optional upgrade to include the .dxf files of all sheet metal components to be cut on a CNC plasma table or laser, and 24 hour phone support from our lead engineer.

products.title: 1999-2025 Ford F-250/F-350 Flatbed W/ 2 Under-Body Boxes
description: The flatbed shown above is designed to turn any 1999-2025 Ford F-250 or F-350 SRW short-bed pickup into stout and functional work horse. This bed is most notable for it's simple un-skirted construction with the addition of 2 under-body truck boxes. It's primary purpose is to help you maximize the amount of deck space & carrying capacity of your pickup.

From the back of the cab-forward, this bed is pretty straight forward. It has a 88"L X 80"W deck, rub rails with stake pockets, a stylish-tapered tail, and 2 under-body boxes (18"L X 10"W X 16"H). The factory rear hitch can still be used with this design.

Upon purchasing this set of plans you will receive: A 36 page .pdf layout detailing all of the cuts, components, plates & assemblies, as well as a 1 page .pdf bill of materials listing everything you'll need for the build. There is also an optional upgrade to include the .dxf CNC files of all sheet metal components that can be cut on a plasma table or laser. All of our plans are service by our 24 hour in-house tech support. Please reach out if you have any questions, concerns, updates, or awesome build photos to share. We look forward to hearing from you!

products.title: 1999-2025 Ford F-250/F-350 Flatbed W/ Large Front Boxes

This bed is most notable for it's large front boxes and rear fender boxes, which allow it to have more dry-storage than it probably appears to have at first. It's primary purpose is to maximize the amount on-board storage of a short-bed pickup, while also offering an elevated style to the truck, and maintaining as much usable deck space as possible.

From the back of the cab-forward, this bed has a 86"L X 80"W deck (49"W between the boxes), rub rails with stake pockets, two large front boxes (25"L X 15"W X 40"H), and two rear fender boxes (20"L X 11"W X 17"H). It also features an integral gooseneck hitch and the factory hitch can still be used with this design.
